items.title: Broadcom, CrowdStrike To Report Results As Investors Look To Jobs Report
items.description: Broadcom, CrowdStrike to report results as investors eye jobs report. EU inflation data for last month will be out on Monday. Stay updated on the week ahead with this release.

items.title: The Smartest Financial Stocks to Buy With $200 Right Now
items.author: Leo Sun
items.description: The article discusses three financial stocks that could be resilient investments in 2024 despite macroeconomic challenges: S&P Global, American Express, and Nu Holdings. It highlights the companies' growth potential, business models, and valuations.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article highlights S&P Global's steady growth, integration of AI tools, and evergreen business model, which justify its premium valuation.
The article praises American Express' business model, which insulates it from economic downturns and interest rate swings, and its steady growth potential.
The article emphasizes Nu Holdings' rapid growth as the largest digital-only bank in Latin America, its expanding ecosystem, and its potential to capitalize on the region's unbanked population.
